change.changenote: Section 1 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 191/2018, effective October 1, 2018.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of interpreting the CGSB Standard, authority having jurisdiction means the Ministry of Water, Land and Air Protection as represented by a director.

change.changenote: Section 1 (1) definition of "director" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 216/2019, effective October 28, 2019.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: director for the purposes of applying this regulation in the Greater Vancouver Regional District, means a district director;
